channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep large pothole, 10th May
item.description:
More than a month

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous highway, 10th May
item.description:
This section of the road is unbelievably damaged. The highway has failed and your inability to actually repair it properly is frustrating. It’s dangerous. From crickley hill park is the same
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black paths blocking path and split, 10th May
item.description:
Black bin bags blocking the path outside 3 Granville Street, wheelchairs and prams would not get by. Have been there since 30th April, now split with rubbish making its way down the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Granville Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes, 10th May
item.description:
There are lots of potholes on the West bound carriageway, spread over quite a distance, hard to avoid all of them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many large potholes, 9th May
item.description:
Potholes can cover the majority of both lanes, have been getting considerably worse recently. Be wary of cars weaving into oncoming traffic trying to avoid them from about 1/4 of a mile before Pilgrove Way to Pilgrove Way when traveling towards Tewkesbury Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10inch pothole has appeared in last few days, 9th May
item.description:
A 10inch pothole has appeared in last few days on the road/junction of North Place and A4019. It’s fairly deep, deeper than a standard pothole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 North Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain?, 9th May
item.description:
Every time it rains, a huge puddle is created here. It spreads into the middle of the road causing cars to swerve, and if they can't the splash soaks the whole pavement, including pedestrians. It's been like this for months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Dewerstone Lodge Thirlestaine Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot holes, 7th May
item.description:
A few large pot holes at this location not sure if you cover this area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Wharf Office The Wharf, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass, 7th May
item.description:
Lots of glass in the alley near to Gristmill Close Some by the park entrance too. Where there’s blame there’s a claim.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Gristmill Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in Mill Lane, 7th May
item.description:
Household waste with possible evidence of culprits address as envelopes/post are strewn around

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Glenfall Lodge Mill Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Huge holes in road at junction, 7th May
item.description:
Extensive number of holes in road now joining together to an extent that there is now less road remaining than the sections which are missing!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Unit r Kingsville Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface disintegrating, 7th May
item.description:
More than just a pothole. The road is totally breaking down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Kingsville Road, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Bishops Drive, Cheltenham

2 pot holes that need filing as it is hard to avoid with parked cars on the other side

item.title: Large pot holes, 6th May
item.description:
There are a collection of large pot holes along the road that have been filled for years. We’re fooled a few weeks ago and now open again
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Millham Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Deep pothole, 5th May
item.description:
There's a hole in the road that's about half a mile deep. People are swerving to miss it. It's going to cause an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 187 Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
